name: Stock 'n Shop
description:
A puzzle game loosely themed around shopping, featuring original art and soundtrack.

Choose items from the conveyor belt and arrange them in your trolley.

Developed using raylib.

Controls

Left/Right click to pick up items from the conveyor belt into the corresponding hands

Left/Right click to place items from the corresponding hands into the cart

Left click and drag to move items in the cart, and mouse wheel/R to rotate whilst dragging.

Note on web version

Sound in the web version is a bit buggy. The sound in the Windows version is more robust.

Additionally rotating using the mouse wheel might not work for some users. Sorry.
